players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead so suddenly. Let's be vigilant and make sure we identify the culprit."
Charlie: "Let's work together to figure out who killed Bob and make sure we don't become the next target."

You: "I believe we should all keep an open mind and consider the possibility that one of us may have unintentionally caused Bob's death. Let's focus on gathering information and working together to solve this mystery."
